issue.title: §[iterator.concept.forward][forward.iterators] Two different definitions of multi-pass guarantee

discussion.p:
There are two different definitions of multi-pass guarantee since . The old one (perhaps introduced by ) seems less reasonable because it requires increment on rvalue iterators of class types, and the semantics of such increment is largely unspecified.
Perhaps only the new definition should be used.
Set priority to 3 after reflector poll.
